articles.description: Jakob Ingebrigtsen and Josh Kerr's epic duel lived up to the billing, but American Cole Hocker ripped up the script to claim gold.
articles.title: Olympics 2024: Josh Kerr and Jakob Ingebrigtsen 'destroy each other' as Cole Hocker triumphs

articles.description: Jack Carlin, Ed Lowe and Hamish Turnbull continue Great Britain's medal-winning start at the Olympics with team sprint silver.
articles.title: Olympics track cycling: Great Britain win men's team sprint silver

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Imane Khelif will fight for Olympic gold on Friday after putting aside the controversy surrounding her gender eligibility.
articles.title: Olympic boxing: Imane Khelif wins to secure place in gold-medal bout

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Brazil vs Spain in the Olympics Women
articles.title: Brazil vs Spain: Olympics Women - BBC Sport

articles.description: Great Britain's Josh Kerr is made to settle for Olympic 1500m silver behind shock champion Cole Hocker, as Jakob Ingebrigtsen misses out on a medal.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Great Britain's Josh Kerr takes 1500m silver behind shock champion Cole Hocker

articles.description: Team GB's Sky Brown overcomes a shoulder injury to claim Olympic bronze in a thrilling women's skateboarding park final in Paris.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Sky Brown wins Olympic skateboarding park bronze

articles.description: Zheng Haohao, who was born on the penultimate day of the 2012 Olympics, becomes China's youngest ever Olympian.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Zheng Haohao, 11, becomes China's youngest Olympian

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text commentary followed by match report from Dynamo Kyiv vs Rangers in the Champions League third qualifying round.
articles.title: Dynamo Kyiv vs Rangers: Champions League - BBC Sport
